meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Flora Leen Gilbert Collins Lindsay Resnick Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7673.

td.p: Flora Leen, a proofreader and editor from Studio City, California
Gilbert Collins, a university administrator from Princeton, New Jersey
Lindsay Resnick, an archivist from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $10,001)

tr.td: YOU ARE NOW ENTERING THE TWILIGHT ZONE
MAPPING OUT ASIA
A CLUE OF GAME
HIS WIDOW LIVED ON
LETHAL WEAPON
"HAND" IT OVER
